snippet: Sunoco and the Carlyle Group announced joint plans to expand and update the Philadelphia refinery, which had been scheduled to close in August.
lead_paragraph: Sunoco and the Carlyle Group announced joint plans to expand and update the Philadelphia refinery, which had been scheduled to close in August.

headline.seo: Sunoco and Carlyle Group to Run Philadelphia Refinery
headline.main: Partnership Formed to Keep Philadelphia Refinery Open
headline.print_headline: Partnership Formed to Keep Philadelphia Refinery Open
